definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: it is said the black hole can engulf everything nearby such as stars.
sentences.chinese: 据说黑洞可以将周围的一切物体，如星星吞食掉。

sentences.english: Black holes are dense, but their event horizons preclude observations.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞密度足够高，但是他们的视界阻止了观察者。

sentences.english: The gravity of a black hole is so strong that not even light can escape it.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞的引力场很强，光也无法逃出。

sentences.english: Infrared light in particular is good to look for when black-hole hunting.
sentences.chinese: 在黑洞“捕捉”物质时，红外线尤其容易被找到。

sentences.english: It is the eternal mystery, the bottomless pit, the black hole.
sentences.chinese: 黑色是一个永恒的迷，无底坑，黑洞。

sentences.english: We could finally get a peek inside a black hole.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于能够对黑洞一窥究竟了。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, the black hole also catapults stars away.
sentences.chinese: 出人意料的是，黑洞也会弹射恒星。

sentences.english: Two doors along, a rubric stood out from the tenebrous gloom.
sentences.chinese: 走过两扇门，黑洞洞的幽暗中显现出注目的题目。

sentences.english: Black hole and worm hole are beyond Norton's laws.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞和虫洞均超越了牛顿定律。

sentences.english: Lastly, the third law of thermodynamics of black-hole has been completely discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，讨论了黑洞的热力学第三定律。

sentences.english: The ring around the black hole is bursting with new star formation.
sentences.chinese: 那个围绕着黑洞的环中正在绽放着恒星诞生的焰火。

sentences.english: It soothed my black hole in the heart and in the stomach.
sentences.chinese: 它让我心脏和胃部的黑洞得到纾缓。

sentences.english: Ed Weiler says the telescope also confirmed the existence of black holes.
sentences.chinese: 埃德维勒说，望远镜也证实了黑洞的存在。

sentences.english: Finding and studying merging black holes has become a very active field of research in astrophysics.
sentences.chinese: 探索研究合并黑洞已经成为天文学界的一个热门领域。

sentences.english: The warping of space-time around a black hole is more intense than anywhere else.
sentences.chinese: 在黑洞周围时空的扭曲，比在其他任何地方更为强烈。

sentences.english: Now he believes that anything emitted from a black hole can be identifiable back to its source, " said Wald, an expert on black holes."
sentences.chinese: 现在他相信从黑洞释放出的任何物质都能追溯到来源。
